name: Hard Game (MartyPartyFun)
description:
This game is not done. This is just a "BETA".

MOVE: Left arrow and right arrow // A and D

JUMP: Up arrow // W

DASH: Left shift // Right shift

Good thing to know about dash is that if you move forward while dashing you go further.

None of the stages are "hard" except the "finale" stage which can be kinda hard. This build is only to test movement.
